// using rafc convert this to component import './LoginSignup.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' // importing the assets import user_icon from '../Assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../Assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../Assets/password.png' export const LoginSignup = () => { const [action, setAction] = useState("Sign Up"); return (
{action}
Lost Password? Click here
{setAction("Sign Up")}}> Sign Up
Login
) } export default LoginSignup
